title: Friend did not recieve skin gift
body:
Hellooo everyone

Last week i gifted my friend Dawnbringer Riven. I'm not sure if he received it or not since it seems like there's no notification. The RP on my account was subtracted and the gift is in my gifting history. Help! o.o

Thanks!

replies.body: No worries! I saw that your gift went through, and even checked your friend's account. They have that skin unlocked and ready to use right now.
